info.contact.name: BC Geographical Names Office
info.description: This REST API provides searchable access to information about geographical names in the province of British Columbia, including name status and details about the corresponding geographic feature.
info.license.name: Crown Copyright
info.title: BC Geographical Names Web Service -
paths./featureCategories.get.description: Gets a list of all feature categories used by the BC Geographical Names Information System (BCGNIS).  Note: there are three levels of classification in the BCGNIS feature taxonomy: classes, categories and types.  A type is a subset of a category, and a category is a subset of a class.
paths./featureClasses.get.description: Gets a list of all feature classes used by the BC Geographical Names Information System (BCGNIS).  Note: there are three levels of classification in the BCGNIS feature taxonomy: classes, categories and types.  A type is a subset of a category, and a category is a subset of a class.
paths./featureTypes.get.description: Gets a list of all feature types used by the BC Geographical Names Information System (BCGNIS).  Note: there are three levels of classification in the BCGNIS feature taxonomy: classes, categories and types.  A type is a subset of a category, and a category is a subset of a class.
paths./features/{featureId}.get.descript: Get information about the geographical feature with the specified featureId.
paths./features/{featureId}.get.paramete: The unique identifier for a feature
paths./features/{featureId}.get.response: Information about the feature with the specified featureId (XML format only)
The feature with the given featureId doesn't exist
paths./features/{featureId}.get.summary: Get a feature by its featureId
paths./nameAuthorities.get.description: Gets a list of all name authorities responsible for naming decisions of the geographical names in the BC Geographical Names Information System (BCGNIS)
paths./names/changes.get.description: Search for information about geographical names which have changed most recently within a specified time window.  Changes may include status cupdates and metadata corrections.
The number of search results to return (1-200)
The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
paths./names/changes.get.parameters[1].d: Defines the earliest date (YYYY-MM-DD format) of the change time window for the search
paths./names/changes.get.parameters[2].d: Defines the latest date (YYYY-MM-DD format) of the change time window for the search
paths./names/changes.get.parameters[3].d: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
paths./names/changes.get.parameters[4].d: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
paths./names/changes.get.parameters[5].d: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
paths./names/changes.get.parameters[6].d: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
paths./names/changes.get.parameters[7].d: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
paths./names/changes.get.parameters[8].d: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
paths./names/changes.get.parameters[9].d: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
paths./names/changes.get.responses.200.d: A list of names matching the search criteria
paths./names/changes.get.responses.400.d: A required parameter is missing or invalid
paths./names/changes.get.summary: Search for names with metadata changes in a given period
paths./names/decisions/recent.get.descri: Search for information about geographical names affected by naming 'decisions' made by the BC Geographical Names Office (naming authority) within the last X days.
paths./names/decisions/recent.get.parame: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
The number of days used to define the time window of naming decisions to search.  The number is interpreted as searching for 'names affected by decisions within the last X days'.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
The number of search results to return (1-200)
paths./names/decisions/recent.get.respon: A list of names matching the search criteria
A required parameter is missing or invalid
paths./names/decisions/recent.get.summar: Search for names affected by recent naming decision
paths./names/decisions/year.get.descript: Search for information about geographical names affected by naming 'decisions' made by the BC Geographical Names Office (naming authority) in a given year.
paths./names/decisions/year.get.paramete: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
The year in which to search for names affected by naming decisions'.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
The number of search results to return (1-200)
paths./names/decisions/year.get.response: A list of names matching the search criteria
A required parameter is missing or invalid
paths./names/decisions/year.get.summary: Search for names affected by naming decisions in a given year
paths./names/inside.get.description: Search for information about geographical names that correspond to features within a geographic bounding box.  Various options and filter parameters are available to refine the search.
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[10].d: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[1].de: A geographic bounding box defining the search area.  Must be specified as a string of the form 'minLongitude,minLatitude,maxLongitude,maxLatitude' (WGS84). e.g. -119,49,-118,50
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[2].de: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[3].de: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[4].de: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[5].de: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[6].de: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[7].de: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[8].de: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
paths./names/inside.get.parameters[9].de: The number of search results to return (1-200)
paths./names/inside.get.responses.200.de: A list of names matching the search criteria
paths./names/inside.get.responses.400.de: A required parameter is missing or invalid
paths./names/near.get.description: Search for information about geographical names that correspond to features within a geographic area defined by a centre point and a radius.  Various options and filter parameters are available to refine the search.
paths./names/near.get.parameters[0].name: outputFormat
paths./names/near.get.parameters[10].des: The number of search results to return (1-200)
paths./names/near.get.parameters[11].des: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
paths./names/near.get.parameters[1].desc: A geographic coordinate specifying the centre point of the search area.  Must be specified as a string of the form 'longitude,latitude' (WGS84).  e.g. -120,51
paths./names/near.get.parameters[1].name: featurePoint
paths./names/near.get.parameters[2].desc: A radius (in kilometres) around the centre point.
paths./names/near.get.parameters[2].name: distance
paths./names/near.get.parameters[3].desc: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
paths./names/near.get.parameters[3].name: featureClass
paths./names/near.get.parameters[4].desc: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
paths./names/near.get.parameters[4].name: featureCategory
paths./names/near.get.parameters[5].desc: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
paths./names/near.get.parameters[5].name: featureType
paths./names/near.get.parameters[6].desc: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
paths./names/near.get.parameters[6].name: sortBy
paths./names/near.get.parameters[7].desc: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
paths./names/near.get.parameters[7].name: outputSRS
paths./names/near.get.parameters[8].desc: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
paths./names/near.get.parameters[8].name: embed
paths./names/near.get.parameters[9].desc: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
paths./names/near.get.parameters[9].name: outputStyle
paths./names/near.get.responses.200.desc: A list of names matching the search criteria
paths./names/near.get.responses.400.desc: A required parameter is missing or invalid
paths./names/near.get.summary: Search near to a geographic point
paths./names/notOfficial/search.get.desc: Search for information about unofficial geographical names by the text of the name itself.  Various options and filter parameters are available to refine the search.
paths./names/notOfficial/search.get.para: The number of search results to return (1-200)
The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
A filter to search based on the the text of the name itself.  Use the asterisk (*) as a wildcard character.  For example 'vancouv*'

If the 'name' parameter is specified, 'exactSpelling' specifies whether to include only names that exactly match the search text (exactSpelling=1), or whether to also include names with similar spellings (exactSpelling=0)

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
paths./names/notOfficial/search.get.resp: A list of names matching the search criteria
A required parameter is missing or invalid
paths./names/notOfficial/search.get.summ: Search by name, limit to unofficial names only
paths./names/official/search.get.descrip: Search for information about official geographical names by the text of the name itself.  Various options and filter parameters are available to refine the search.
paths./names/official/search.get.paramet: The number of search results to return (1-200)
The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
A filter to search based on the the text of the name itself.  Use the asterisk (*) as a wildcard character.  For example 'vancouv*'

If the 'name' parameter is specified, 'exactSpelling' specifies whether to include only names that exactly match the search text (exactSpelling=1), or whether to also include names with similar spellings (exactSpelling=0)

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.

A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
paths./names/official/search.get.respons: A list of names matching the search criteria
A required parameter is missing or invalid
paths./names/official/search.get.summary: Search by name, limit to official names only
paths./names/search.get.description: Search for information about geographical names by the text of the name itself.  The response will include both official and unofficial names.  Various options and filter parameters are available to refine the search.
paths./names/search.get.parameters[10].d: The number of search results to return (1-200)
paths./names/search.get.parameters[11].d: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
paths./names/search.get.parameters[1].de: A filter to search based on the the text of the name itself.  Use the asterisk (*) as a wildcard character.  For example 'vancouv*'
paths./names/search.get.parameters[2].de: If the 'name' parameter is specified, 'exactSpelling' specifies whether to include only names that exactly match the search text (exactSpelling=1), or whether to also include names with similar spellings (exactSpelling=0)
paths./names/search.get.parameters[3].de: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
paths./names/search.get.parameters[4].de: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
paths./names/search.get.parameters[5].de: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
paths./names/search.get.parameters[6].de: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
paths./names/search.get.parameters[7].de: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
paths./names/search.get.parameters[8].de: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
paths./names/search.get.parameters[9].de: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
paths./names/search.get.responses.200.de: A list of names matching the search criteria
paths./names/search.get.responses.400.de: A required parameter is missing or invalid
paths./names/{nameId}.{outputFormat}.get: Get information about the geographical name with the specified nameId.
The unique identifier for a name
Information about the name with the specified nameId
The name with the given nameId doesn't exist, or the output format is invalid.
Get a name by its nameId
